name: Combat Zone (Keypunch Software)
overview: Dack MacKenzie is your name; the most fearless and hot-headed one man army this has seen in a long time! Ballistic expert, tank operator and ace helicopter pilot; you'll do whatever it takes to get the job done right the first time! Operation Skylark is your next assignment, the most difficult and dangerous yet. Enemy forces have been detected on American soil, and it's your job to stop them cold! Use your combat skills to blast apart the waves of enemy attack! Get the job done right the first time.. or it may be your last!
